attributes.action: Change mental health policies to support those in the cost of living crisis
attributes.additional_details: peoples mental health is being impacted in a negative way by the cost of living crisis
attributes.background: more free mental health support regarding the cost of living crisis

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634345

If you want the Government to do something different you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
